instruction: Please review the exhibit below and identify which factors performed well during each stage of the macroeconomic cycle, based on the three indicators used.
output: Based on the exhibit provided, we can see that during the recovery stage of the macroeconomic cycle, the low size and value factors outperformed. During the expansion stage, momentum was the best performing factor. During the slowdown stage, low volatility was the top performer. Finally, during the contraction stage, low volatility and quality were the leading factors.
